original_text:
who builds his upper chambers in the heavens
    and founds his vault upon the earth;
who calls for the waters of the sea
    and pours them out upon the surface of the earth—
the Lord is his name.
korean_text: 그의 궁전을 하늘에 세우시며 그 궁창의 기초를 땅에 두시며 바닷물을 불러 지면에 쏟으시는 이니 그 이름은 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: who builds his upper chambers in the heavens
and founds his vault upon the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅 위에 그의 궁창을 기초 놓으시며

sentences.original_text: who calls for the waters of the sea
and pours them out upon the surface of the earth
